first_para: John David Penrose (born 22 June 1964) is the Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Weston-super-Mare. He was the Minister for Tourism & Heritage at the Department for Culture, Media and Sport from 2010-2012.

full.extract: John David Penrose (born 22 June 1964) is the Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Weston-super-Mare. He was the Minister for Tourism & Heritage at the Department for Culture, Media and Sport from 2010-2012.
full.title: John Penrose
